content: this totally fab little bag makes a perfect make-up bag reuseable gift bag or dice bag which is what it was designed for the one piece construction provides a solid bag with croc stitch dragon egg element that is all one with the bag lining and top by varying the size of yarn you use and the size of hook you can make everything from a mini bag that s just right for a few dice or a great big bag that can be used as a purse
